mapper.select: SELECT Left(a.recedate,4) + '-' + substring(a.recedate, 5,2)+ '-' + substring(a.recedate, 7,2) as recedate, a.custcd, a.spjangcd, a.recenum, a.cltcd, a.actcd, b.actnm, b.perid as actperid, e.pernm as actpernm, a.equpcd, c.equpnm, a.contcd, d.contnm, a.contents, Left(a.recetime,2) + ':' + substring(a.recetime, 2,2) as recetime, a.perid, e.pernm, a.divicd, f.divinm, CASE a.resultck WHEN '1' THEN '처리' WHEN '0' THEN '미처리' end as resultck FROM tb_e401 a WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_E601 b WITh(NOLOCK) ON (a.custcd = b.custcd AND a.spjangcd = b.spjangcd AND a.actcd = b.actcd) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_E611 c WITh(NOLOCK) ON (a.custcd = c.custcd AND a.spjangcd = c.spjangcd AND a.actcd = c.actcd AND a.equpcd = c.equpcd) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_E010 d WITh(NOLOCK) ON (a.custcd = d.custcd AND a.spjangcd = d.spjangcd AND a.contcd = d.contcd) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_JA001 e WITh(NOLOCK) ON (a.custcd = e.custcd AND a.spjangcd = e.spjangcd AND 'p' + b.perid = e.perid) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_JC002 f WITh(NOLOCK) ON (a.custcd = f.custcd AND a.spjangcd = f.spjangcd AND a.divicd = f.divicd) WHERE a.spjangcd = #{spjangcd} AND a.resultck like CONCAT('%',#{changeop},'%') AND a.recedate BETWEEN #{frdate} AND #{todate}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_e411 (custcd, spjangcd, compnum, compdate, arrivdate, arrivtime, resultcd, recedate, recenum, recetime, divicd, actperid, perid, pernm, actcd, actnm, equpcd, equpnm, resutime, comptime, contcd, contremark, gregicd, regicd, remocd, faccd, resucd, remoremark, remark, resuremark, inputdate, inperid, "result") values (#{custcd}, #{spjangcd}, #{compnum}, #{compdate}, #{arrivdate}, #{arrivtime}, #{resultcd}, ${recedate}, #{recenum}, #{recetime}, #{divicd}, #{perid}, #{actperid}, #{pernm}, #{actcd}, #{actnm}, #{equpcd}, #{equpnm}, #{resutime}, #{comptime}, #{contcd}, #{contremark}, #{gregicd}, #{regicd}, #{remocd}, #{faccd}, #{resucd}, #{remoremark}, #{remark}, #{resuremark}, #{inputdate}, #{inperid}, '1')
mapper.select: select max(compnum) from tb_e411 where compdate = #{compdate}

SELECT a.custcd custcd, a.spjangcd spjangcd, a.cltcd, a.actcd, a.actnm, a.equpcd, a.equpnm, c.pernm as actpernm, Left(a.recedate,4) + '-' + substring(a.recedate, 5,2)+ '-' + substring(a.recedate, 7,2) as recedate, Left(a.recetime,2) + ':' + substring(a.recetime, 2,2) as recetime, a.hitchdate, a.hitchhour, 1 as cnt, 1 as ascnt, c.pernm as recepernm, d.pernm, e.divinm, f.contnm, a.contents as contremark, g.resunm, resuremark, h.pernm as repernm, i.remonm, b.faccd, j.facnm, b.remoremark, k.greginm, l.reginm, -- isnull(b.result, '0')as result, CASE b.result WHEN '1' THEN '처리' WHEN '0' THEN '미처리' end as result, Left( b.arrivdate,4) + '-' + substring( b.arrivdate, 5,2)+ '-' + substring( b.arrivdate, 7,2) as arrivdate, Left(b.arrivtime,2) + ':' + substring(b.arrivtime, 2,2) as arrivtime, Left( b.compdate,4) + '-' + substring( b.compdate, 5,2)+ '-' + substring(b.compdate, 7,2) as compdate, Left(b.comptime,2) + ':' + substring(b.comptime, 2,2) as comptime, b.resutime, b.resulttime, m.resultnm FROM tb_e401 a WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_ja001 c WITH(NOLOCK) ON (a.custcd = c.custcd AND a.spjangcd = c.spjangcd AND 'p' + a.perid = c.perid ) LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_ja001 h WITH(NOLOCK) ON (a.custcd = h.custcd AND a.spjangcd = h.spjangcd AND 'p' + a.reperid = h.perid ) LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_e010 f WITH(NOLOCK) ON (a.custcd = f.custcd AND a.spjangcd = f.spjangcd AND a.contcd = f.contcd) LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_e411 b WITH(NOLOCK) ON (a.custcd = b.custcd AND a.spjangcd = b.spjangcd AND a.recedate = b.recedate AND a.recenum = b.recenum) LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_ja001 d WITH(NOLOCK) ON (b.custcd = d.custcd AND b.spjangcd = d.spjangcd AND 'p' + b.perid = d.perid ) LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_jc002 e WITH(NOLOCK) ON (d.custcd = e.custcd AND d.spjangcd = e.spjangcd AND d.divicd = e.divicd) LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_e012 g WITH(NOLOCK) ON (b.custcd = g.custcd AND b.spjangcd = g.spjangcd AND b.resucd = g.resucd) LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_e011 i WITH(NOLOCK) ON (b.custcd = i.custcd AND b.spjangcd = i.spjangcd AND b.remocd = i.remocd) LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_e019 j WITH(NOLOCK) ON (b.custcd = j.custcd AND b.spjangcd = j.spjangcd AND b.faccd = j.faccd) LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_e013 k WITH(NOLOCK) ON (b.custcd = k.custcd AND b.spjangcd = k.spjangcd AND b.gregicd = k.gregicd) LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_e014 l WITH(NOLOCK) ON (b.custcd = l.custcd AND b.spjangcd = l.spjangcd AND b.gregicd = l.gregicd AND b.regicd = l.regicd ) LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_e015 m WITH(NOLOCK) ON (b.custcd = m.custcd AND b.spjangcd = m.spjangcd AND b.resultcd = m.resultcd) ,
tb_e601 t WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE a.custcd = b.custcd AND a.spjangcd = b.spjangcd and a.actcd = t.actcd AND a.custcd = #{custcd} AND a.spjangcd = #{spjangcd} AND a.recedate BETWEEN #{stdate} AND #{enddate} AND Case when isnull(b.compdate,'') = '' then '1' else '2' end like #{comp}
